ValidationRule.description: It should not be possible to skip stage Proposal, as this will also skip credit evaluation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Sales' && ISCHANGED( StageName ) && ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Needs Analysis') && !ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Proposal') && !ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed Lost')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: It is not allowed to skip Proposal, as this will prevent credit evaluation.
